solution_line_template: Tony can skip at twice the speed that Bruce can, for a speed of {bruce_speed}*{tony_multiplier}=<<{bruce_speed}*{tony_multiplier}={tony_speed}>>{tony_speed} miles per hour.
Brandon can skip at one-third the speed that Tony can, for a speed of {tony_speed}*({brandon_fraction}) = {brandon_speed} miles per hour.
Colin can skip at {colin_multiplier} times the speed that Brandon can, for a speed of ({brandon_speed}*{colin_multiplier}={colin_speed} miles per hour).
